english.segment1: I want to be ready. When the Son Almighty comes. To lay claim to Him. And Him, alone. I want to be ready. To stand at His side. For His eyes to gaze upon me. In His glory and might
english.segment2: I want to be ready. I want to be ready. I want to be ready. For Him and Him, alone. I want to be
english.segment3: I want to be ready. To cry out His name. To lay up in His arms. Delight in His fame. I want to be ready. To be embraced by His love. Before Thee Almighty. To take me up above
english.segment4: I want to be ready. I want to be ready. I want to be ready. For Him and Him alone. I want to be ready. I want to be ready. I want to be.. ready
english.segment5: To gaze upon Your throne. To give You all I own. O My King. To fall upon my knees. To give You all the glory
english.segment6: I want to be ready. I want to be ready. I want to be ready. For You alone. I want to be
